home.title: Smart Contracts, Smarter Future
home.subtitle: GTU Blockchain Club brings Web3 and Blockchain technologies together with young minds under the leadership of Gebze Technical University.

about.title: Shaping the Future with Blockchain Technology
about.description: GTU Blockchain Club was established within Gebze Technical University to bring together students interested in blockchain technology, follow the latest developments in the sector, and produce innovative projects. We encourage learning both theoretically and practically by blending this revolutionary technology in the digital world with academic knowledge.

goals.title: Our Goals:
items: Providing education on Blockchain, Web3, Smart Contracts and DeFi
Producing innovative projects with software and project teams
Providing hands-on experience through hackathons and workshops
Creating career opportunities with industry professionals

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We believe that blockchain technology will shape the future. As GTU Blockchain, we aim to train individuals who not only use this technology but also develop it. We act with the vision of representing our university in national and international arenas with a strong team spirit, being a sincere and productive family.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to introduce the potential of blockchain technology to students, ensure that they become competent individuals in this field, and build an ecosystem that offers sustainable contributions. We aim to promote technical development through workshops, competitions and trainings, while moving our community forward with local and global collaborations.

ethprague.title: 2025 ETHPrague Hackathon
ethprague.description: Participated in ETHPrague hackathon event with a team of 12 people
details: In our first international hackathon experience, we succeeded in entering Blockscout's $10,000 prize pool with 2 different projects
This success is just a beginning for GTU Blockchain.
